name: Bot-Breakers: Robotic Encounters of War
description:
Being a beastly battle bot is all well and good, until the other bots show up. Throw hammers to disable and injure them while avoiding getting hit yourself.

Gameplay requires a controller (well... I didn't remove the keyboard functions, but I can't tell you what keys do what).  X and Y on an XBox controller will throw the left and right hammers respectively.
